s0051: Ruo Ao twenty years, Zhou You Wang by Quan Rong assassinated, Zhou east moved, Qin Xiang Gong began ranked as feudal lords.
s0052: Twenty seven years, Ruo Ao died, son Xiong Kan established, this was Xiao Ao.
s0053: Xiao Ao six years, died, son Xiong Shun established, this was Fen Mao.
s0054: Fen Mao thirteen years, Jin began chaos, because Qu Wo reason.
s0056: Fen Mao younger brother Xiong Tong assassinated Fen Mao son replaced established, this was Chu Wu Wang.
s0057: Wu Wang seventeen years, Jin Qu Wo Zhuang Bo assassinated main state Jin Xiao Hou.
s0058: Nineteen years, Zheng Bo younger brother Duan made chaos.
s0059: Twenty one years, Zheng invaded heavenly son land.
s0060: Twenty three years, Wei assassinated their lord Huan Gong.
s0061: Twenty nine years, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong.
s0062: Thirty one years, Song Tai Zai Hua Du assassinated their lord Shang Gong.
s0063: Thirty five years, Chu attacked Sui.
s0066: Now feudal lords all for rebel mutually invade, or mutually kill.
s0067: I have worn armor, wish observe central states governance, please royal house honor my title.'
s0068: Sui people for them Zhou, requested honor Chu, royal house not listened, returned reported Chu.
s0069: Thirty seven years, Chu Xiong Tong angered said: 'My ancestor Yu Xiong, Wen Wang teacher, early ended.
s0070: Cheng Wang raised my previous duke, then with zi nan land made dwell Chu, barbarian all submitted obeyed, yet wang not added position, I self honor.'
s0071: Then self established as Wu Wang, with Sui people allied left.
s0072: Then began opened Pu land had it.
s0073: Fifty one years, Zhou summoned Sui Hou, rebuked with established Chu as wang.
s0074: Chu angered, because Sui betrayed self, attacked Sui.
s0075: Wu Wang died army middle troops stopped.
s0076: Son Wen Wang Xiong Zi established, began capital Ying.
s0077: Wen Wang two years, attacked Shen passed Deng, Deng people said 'Chu wang easy take', Deng Hou not allowed.
s0078: Six years, attacked Cai, captured Cai Ai Hou returned, already released him.
s0079: Chu strong, overawed Jiang Han between small states, small states all feared it.
s0080: Eleven years, Qi Huan Gong began hegemon, Chu also began great.
s0081: Twelve years, attacked Deng, extinguished it.
s0082: Thirteen years, died, son Xiong Jian established, this was Zhuang Ao.
s0083: Zhuang Ao five years, wished kill his younger brother Xiong Yun, Yun fled Sui, with Sui attacked assassinated Zhuang Ao replaced established, this was Cheng Wang.
s0084: Cheng Wang Yun first year, initial established, spread virtue granted favor, joined old good with feudal lords.
s0085: Made people offered heavenly son, heavenly son granted zhu, said: 'Secure your southern Yi Yue chaos, no invade central states.'
s0087: Sixteen years, Qi Huan Gong with troops invaded Chu, reached Xing mountain.
s0088: Chu Cheng Wang made general Qu Wan with troops defended it, allied with Huan Gong.
s0089: Huan Gong rebuked with Zhou tribute not entered royal house, Chu promised it, then left.
s0090: Eighteen years, Cheng Wang with troops north attacked Xu, Xu jun bare flesh apologized, then released him.
s0093: Thirty three years, Song Xiang Gong wished make alliance meeting, summoned Chu.
s0094: Chu wang angered said: 'Summon me, I will good go attack humiliate him.'
s0095: Then went, reached Meng, then seized humiliated Song Gong, already returned him.
s0096: Thirty four years, Zheng Wen Gong south court Chu.
s0097: Chu Cheng Wang north attacked Song, defeated at Hong, shot wounded Song Xiang Gong, Xiang Gong then ill wound died.
s0098: Thirty five years, Jin crown prince Chong Er passed Chu, Cheng Wang with feudal lords guest ritual feasted, thick sent to Qin.
s0099: Thirty nine years, Lu Xi Gong came requested troops to attack Qi, Chu made Shen Hou lead troops attacked Qi, took Gu, placed Qi Huan Gong son Yong there.
s0100: Qi Huan Gong seven sons all fled Chu, Chu all made upper grand masters.
